title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, attempting to create a new table group does not display the group dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed when a table report item is added without setting the dataset and trying to create a new table group.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
